START.name: Outskirts of desert citadel
START.desc: You stand on the westward outskirts of a desert citadel. You see bustle in the streets.

BAZAAR.name: Bazaar
BAZAAR.desc: Hectic bazaar in the Western corridor of the citadel.

ARMOURY.name: ARMOURY
ARMOURY.desc: You are in a small but impressive armoury. Glittering swords, axes, spears, and shields line the walls. A crumudgeonly old man sits at the counter.

items.desc: An ancient scimitar leans against the counter, seemingly emanating a slight hum.
items.take: The worn leather handle feels perfect in your hand. Almost as if it was made for you...

APOTHECARY.name: APOTHECARY
APOTHECARY.desc: You are in a dark, dank apothecary. With no windows, only the glow of the various elixirs lights the chamber. The smell of exotic ingredients fill the air.

items.desc: A lizard tail sits on the counter. You've heard this ingredient is great for health potions.
items.take: The severed tail squirms in your palm. You put it in your pocket

TEAHOUSE.name: TEAHOUSE
TEAHOUSE.desc: The teahouse is fragrant and filled with people. Most of them sit in hushed conversations, eyeing you suspiciously.

OWNER'S QUARTERS.name: OWNER'S QUARTERS
OWNER'S QUARTERS.desc: The owner's room is filled to the brim with strange trinkets, but none of them seem particularly valuable...

STOCKROOM.name: STOCKROOM
STOCKROOM.desc: The stockroom has strange ingredients and tools sealed in glass bottles. Someone would surely notice if you took anything...

KITCHEN.name: KITCHEN
KITCHEN.desc: Chefs and cooks bustle around the kitchen, but you doubt you could take anything without them seeing...
